meanings.definition: A card used to record the hours worked by an employee.
meanings.sent1: At the end of the week, I fill out my timecard with the hours I worked.
meanings.sent2: The company requires all employees to submit their timecards by Friday.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled coffee on my timecard, so now it looks like modern art.
meanings.sent4: Her timecard is like a puzzle, each hour a piece that fits perfectly into her workweek.
meanings.sent5: The timecard is a paper trail of dedication, each entry a testament to hard work.

meanings.definition: A card used to track the amount of time spent on a particular task or project.
meanings.sent1: I use a timecard to monitor how long I spend on each project.
meanings.sent2: The timecard helps me stay organized and focused on my tasks.
meanings.sent3: My timecard is so full, it's like a diary of my daily activities.
meanings.sent4: Each task on the timecard is a chapter in the story of my productivity.
meanings.sent5: The timecard is a roadmap of my day, guiding me through each project with precision.
